summary: This is my first mod which adds 8 Npc merchants which sell a lot of ingot (iron, steel, dwarves...)
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod which adds 8 Npc merchants which sell a lot of ingot, iron ingot, steel ingot, ebony, gold, moonstone, quicksilver, silver ingot, corundum, Orichalcum...

   I think this mod is useful for forging weapons and armor, because sellers do not have enough ingots

   This mod is a good choice for smithing.

   They can be found in major cities of skyrim, Whiterun, Whiterun Skyforge, Falkreath, Dawnstar, Riften, Solitude, Windhelm. 

   The NPCs have 3 000 gold;
- 5 Ebony Ingots
- 5 Gold Ingots
- 5 Moonstone Ingots
- 5 QuickSilver Ingots
- 15 Malachite Ingots
- 10 Silver Ingots
- 20 Dwarve Ingots
- 35 Orichalcum Ingots
- 50 Corundum Ingots
- 100 Steel Ingots
- 150 Iron Ingots

  Later, I think making a cheat version of this mod.

  If you liked this mod, please endorse me :)

  if ever the mod does not work, please let me known

Caudadraconis69
author: Caudadraconis69
